1216940.name: 神柄の雫 (かみからのしずく)
1216940.description:
What kind of game?

”Shizuku: Japanese myth" is a 2D action adventure game set in the world of Japanese mythology.
The main character, a young fox girl named Rin, sets out to save a world where strange things have happened!
While it has the face of an action game, it also has a deep scenario and worldview, making it a game where the storyline changes depending on who plays.

Story

A drop of divine pattern that drips only once a year. The balance of the world was maintained by it, but one day it was cursed by someone. In order to restore peace to the world, a fox girl named "Rin" stood up.

Action

The main character in this game is a little fox girl named Rin.
In Japan, foxes have long been famous for being able to disguise themselves.
She can disguise herself in various forms and can take over not only target appearance but also target abilities.
In addition to her "fox state" and "human state," she can also transform into "RedOni" and other enemy characters.

Fox State
The fox's ability to move quickly and get into tight crevices.

Human State
In human form, you can use weapons such as wooden swords.
The use of a weapon will cause continuous and reliable damage to the enemy.


RedOni State
RedOni's ability to perform "head-butt".
The "head-butt" can break things that are prone to rupture or hard objects.

Battle

By transforming into a form that matches the enemy's ability, you can fight a battle with the enemy to your advantage.
For example, a yokai whose body is made of balloons can be effectively head-butted with the akaoni's horn.



There is more than one way to get through the challenges you face.
There are various strategies to suit your style of play.
